title: Status shows up as Mobile when Offline
body: I installed the mobile chat app but then uninstalled. How come it still shows my profile up as Mobile when I'm Offline?

replies.body:
If you don't log out you won't be offline.  :)  PSA for people looking to uninstall: log out first! 

There is a natural decay though, so in about 14 days from your uninstall you'll automatically switch from mobile --> offline and won't display as mobile anymore.
